entries.name: x_unc
entries.info: Global X coor unc (cm) of hit

entries.name: y_unc
entries.info: Global Y coor unc (cm) of hit

entries.name: z_unc
entries.info: Global Z coor unc (cm) of hit

entries.name: tx
entries.info: Global X coor (cm) of hit from CVT info -trkID index

entries.name: ty
entries.info: Global Y coor (cm) of hit from CVT info - trkID index

entries.name: tz
entries.info: Global Z coor (cm) of hit from CVT info - trkID index

entries.name: tlength
entries.info: pathlength of the track from the entrance point to the exit point through the hit bar

entries.name: pathlength
entries.info: pathlength of the track from the vertex (doca point to the beamline to the midpoint between the entrance and exit of the hit bar

name: CND::clusters
info: reconstructed cluster info from CND and CTOF

entries.name: sector
entries.info: sector of the cluster's seed hit

entries.name: layer
entries.info: layer of the cluster's seed hit

entries.name: component
entries.info: component of the cluster's seed hit

entries.name: size
entries.info: number of hits of the cluster

entries.name: energy
entries.info: Sum of E dep (MeV) of the hits

entries.name: x
entries.info: center of X coor (cm) of the hits

entries.name: y
entries.info: center of Y coor (cm) of the hits

entries.name: z
entries.info: center of Z coor (cm) of the hits

entries.name: time
entries.info: center of time (ns) of the hits

entries.name: pathLengthThruBar
entries.info: pathlength of the track from the entrance point to the exit point through the cluster bars
